articles.description: A TikTok account is best known for reproducing the favorite salads of celebrities – but are they good?
articles.content: Among the terrible revelations in a Daily Mailreport earlier this week about the demise of the relationship between actors Olivia Wilde and Jason Sudeikis in 2020 was that Wilde allegedly made a bowl… [+4177 chars]

articles.title: Alec Baldwin shooting on Rust set: It's been a year since Halyna Hutchins was accidentally shot dead. Is the DA finally close to bringing charges? - Sky News
articles.content: On 21 October 2021, Halyna Hutchins turned up to the Bonanza Creek Ranch in New Mexico, the set of the western film she was working on with star Alec Baldwin, for what should have been a normal day a… [+16259 chars]
